data.title: Kingdom of Lithuania
authors: Contributors to Mount&Blade: Medieval Conquestpedia Wiki

data.text:
The Kingdom of Lithuania is one of the 42 factions of the Medieval Conquest. Lithuania was ruled by King Mindaugas while the claimant is King Daumantas. The capital of Lithuania is Vilnius (while historically, is Kernavė).

At the start of the game, the Kingdom of Lithuania is at peace, however it soon be at war with either its main rival the Teutonic Order, the Baltic tribes, and soon in the near future, Lithuania will be at war with its neighbors, the Scandinavia factions and the Muslim factions.

It is a Baltic Pagan kingdom.

History[]

For centuries, the southeastern shore of the Baltic Sea was inhabited by various Baltic tribes, including the Curonians, the Samogitians, the Prussians, and the Yotvingians. In the 1230s, the Lithuanian lands were united by Mindaugas I, the Grand Duke of Lithuania, and the first unified Lithuanian state, however on 6 July 1253 he was crowned by Pope Innocent IV. Mindaugas, who had reverted to paganism, and two of his sons were assassinated two years later, and while Mindaugas survived the assassination, he proclaim King and proclaim that his promise to return of the Grand Duchy. In the course of two years of 1255 to early 1257, he had on-and off wars with the Baltic tribes, and also made a temporality peace with the Teutonic Order.

Lithuania, also known as the Grand Duchy of Lithuania from 1236 to 1253, which Mindaugas' ancession as King, however it was switched back to Grand Duchy status by the current King Mindaugas in 1257. Lithuania went on becoming a independent state until 1386 when Grand Duke Jogaila, later King Władysław II Jagiełło signed the Union of Krewo that establish of a dynastic union between Lithuania and the Crown of the Kingdom of Poland. However with its unsuccessful wars with the Teutonic Knights, and the Grand Duchy of Moscow. Eventually, the Union of Lublin of 1569 created a new state, the Polish–Lithuanian Commonwealth, however after more than two hundred twenty years of it's Poland-Lithuania empire under one monarchs, it bagan to fragmented until its collapse after the series of partitions.

Rulers[]

King Mindaugas

Initial ruler

King Daumantas

Territories[]

The territory of the Kingdom of Lithuania contains the following towns, castles, and villages:

Note that over the course of the game, other kingdoms may besiege and take over these lands, and the Kingdom of Lithuania may gain more. However, these places are the only ones from which you can recruit Baltic recruits, and also mercenaries in taverns.
